p: Table 8 shows the lethal concentration (LD 50) of the EO, ME+EO, and ME against brine shrimp ( A. salina) nauplii. Several studies have described the toxicity of EOs against brine shrimp nauplii. 70–72 However, the results of this study showed that EO was not toxic against brine shrimp nauplii, with LD 50 values higher than 1000 μg/mL. Moreover, brine shrimp nauplii treated with ME+EO and ME were found to be viable, with LD 50 values >30 μg/mL, which was the highest tested concentration of these formulations in this assay.
